Package com.intellij.codeInsight.template

Class Template

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.intellij.codeInsight.template.Template
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    PresentableLookupValue
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    TemplateImpl

    public abstract class Template
extends java.lang.Object
implements PresentableLookupValue
    Used to build and run a live template.
    See Also:
    TemplateManager

      • setInline

        public abstract void setInline(boolean isInline)
        Inline templates do not insert text. They install editing segments (red rectangles) in existing text in document: from the `caret offset` to `caret offset + templateString length`. E.g. they might be useful for inplace rename.
        See Also:
        TemplateState.start(TemplateImpl, PairProcessor, Map)

      • getSegmentsCount

      • getString

        public abstract java.lang.String getString()
        Returns:
        template text as it appears in Live Template settings, including variables surrounded with '$'
        See Also:
        getTemplateText()

      • getTemplateText

        public abstract java.lang.String getTemplateText()
        Returns:
        template text without any variables and with '$' character escapes removed.
        See Also:
        getString()
